description: Ordinary NEET Hasegawa Ryou discovered that his reality had turned completely into a Romance Game world as soon as he woke up. Thus he sets out to capture his targets with his freely usable “Save & Load” and “Item” abilities. But it turns out that what he got involved with, was a life-risking game with very dangerous women to capture!>
